amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 118-12 to prohibit federal funds unter Title I and Title II from going to a local educational agency unless they hold an open enrollment period.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit federal funds under Title I and Title II from going to a local educational agency unless they hold an open enrollment period.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 338 (Roll no. 152).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Davidson.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 338 (Roll no. 152).
